description: Watch Premier League highlights: Man Utd 0-0 Man City, Tottenham 3-1 Southampton, Brentford 0-0 Chelsea, Fulham 3-2 Liverpool
title: Watch Premier League highlights: Man Utd 0-0 Man City, Tottenham 3-1 Southampton, Brentford 0-0 Chelsea, Fulham 3-2 Liverpool
title_page: Watch Premier League highlights: Man Utd 0-0 Man City, Tottenham 3-1 Southampton, Brentford 0-0 Chelsea, Fulham 3-2 Liverpool - BBC Sport
maintext:
Highlights and analysis from Sunday's four Premier League fixtures, plus the best of the action from the rest of the weekend.
If you missed Match of the Day 2, catch up now on BBC iPlayer.
And you can watch Saturday's Match of the Day here.
